item.title: Rate the Psysician trying to see what the average rating is
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
So basically if unseen has 1 enforcer/sage , there’s a reaper in game , there’s an inq and there’s 3 knights + 3 CWs , you reduce the people you can heal to 9-10 from 16. Over than 1/2. But since there’s some sort of prevention , besides sage’s WoF , you can not heal anyone at all.

item.title: Rate the Psysician trying to see what the average rating is
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
in the current state of the game , the only attacks that phys can not heal are :

  • Assassin’s Assassinate if Unseen has Enforcer/Sage(Obvious reasons) , Servant/Alcoholic/Poacher(You can not heal them at all)
  • Reaper’s Reap
  • Inquisitor’s Ruthless Efficiency
  • Possessor’s Possess
  • Any Killer classes empowered by The CW

item.title: Rate the Psysician trying to see what the average rating is
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
I picked 8, since it gets boring always getting Physician(I once got a 6 round streak only getting phy)

But it’s still amazing. It can cure bleeds, poison, could say f u to OE, and even deletes possessor’s possess ability. Only down part is Reaper, which in that case you are as useless as a bug in modern days when dealing with him. You also can make a person immune to poison and bleeds, and back then, you could even make a person a DK.

I hate Physician, but I hate it with a passion.

Read full topic
item.source: Rate the Psysician trying to see what the average rating is

You want to set it up as a number rating so that it automatically calculates the average

  • 2
  • 3
  • 4
  • 5
  • 6
  • 7
  • 8
  • 9
  • 10
